name: tyrant serum
description: A super-concentrated mutagen strongly resembling children's toy slime.  You need a syringe to inject it… if you really want to?

name: tyrant mutagen
description: An extremely rare mutagen cocktail, it smells like blood and is a green goop with blood-red streaks
A super-concentrated mutagen not for those frightened of this thing they have become.  You need a syringe to inject it… if you really want to?
An extremely rare mutagen cocktail, it seeks to cure what's deep inside.
